title: 186 43 "Capriccio for Despair! The Impending Doom of Sky Island!"Transliteration: "Zetsubō e no kyōsōkyoku hakari kuru sorajima no shōmetsu!!" (Japanese:絶望への狂想曲迫り来る空島の消滅!!) Hidehiko Kadota Hirohiko Kamisaka March 21, 2004(2004-03-21) November 27, 2008
